name: Ancient Wanderlust
description:
As a traveller you are exploring few different famous ancient places in a search of antique objects parts. Avoid all the booby traps as you wander through the ancient ruins. After collecting all of the object you need to connect them together to discover a treasure.

  Rules 

Rules:  The Traveller needs to avoid obstacles during the maze exploration to find missing parts of ancient objects. After collecting the objects, you need to fix these objects by combining them in a specially prepared workbench.  

Lives: The Traveller has 3 lives which he may lose if he gets hit by arrows, if the player stands on spikes, falls in a hole or is cut by a saw, he dies immediately.

Movement: Arrow keys or WASD

Fixing objects: After collecting all of the objects the Player needs to go to the workbench at the beginning of the map, press E button and start combining elements by dragging them out to the specially prepared spots.

Exit game: Alt + F4

Crew:

Julia Kłysiak – Project Management, Level Design

Ricardo Madeira – Programmer

Doris Leung – Graphic Designer
